text: cī ʙaso dehaho, ki mardumaşro ʙa saʙaʙi ito'at nakardanaşon amri Moro ʙa halokat rasonidaem va azoʙi mo hangomi şaʙ jo on goh, ki ʙa xoʙi nisfirūzī furū rafta ʙudand, ʙa onon darrasid. (Alloh in du vaqtro maxsus zikr namudaast, zero in du vaqt; vaqti oromiş va istirohatand. Pas omadani azoʙ dar in vaqtho ʙadtar va saxttar ast)
